note.p: Career: Professor of Social Biology in the University of London
AssocMaterial: CSAC 78/2/81; NCUACS 29/5/91; NCUACS 53/2/95. Papers deposited in Birmingham University Library
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1978 vol 24 pp 183-221, plate, by G P Wells
References: Milo Keynes, 'Lancelot Hogben, FRS (1895-1975): A Review of his Autobiography', review of Adrian and Anne Hogben, Lancelot Hogben - Scientific Humanist in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 361-369, plate
